name: Manipulated (itch)
description:
Use the WASD buttons to draw in-game and follow the described lines, a somewhat hidden path is also shown for an alternative approach to your task.

M - Mute Sound

This is a personal project, it gives a bit of a look into my life and the journey I have been on in terms of self-identity with gender and general personality. It's hard to explain, but I am happy that I finally managed to release something again.
